name: LoudDoor
overview:
The LoudDoor Platform provides deep insights into your Facebook fans, and the fans of your competitors, by providing valuable data such as household income, consumption habits, brand perception, attitudinal metrics and more.

Our Platform provides data intelligence for Facebook Pages that will rival your insights from any marketing channel.

Our Platform’s advanced targeting algorithms will identify Facebook Ad keyword lists to grow your Page with fans that match the most valuable Facebook audience segments for your industry. Simply stated, these are the active Facebook users that are more likely to buy your product. They are your ideal fan. In addition, our targeting algorithms include proprietary engagement metrics. This adds an optimization layer specific to Facebook Pages which ensures you are acquiring fans that are also more likely to engage with your brand on Facebook.

Using Facebook as a channel to increase market share and deliver long-term sustainable ROI starts by engaging the right audience. This is our specialty at LoudDoor, and we are the industry leader in ROI-centered audience acquisition on Facebook.
